website_summaries.verdict: Soft and comfy toilet seat consisting of a wood core covered with cushioned vinyl, available in 7 attractive pastel colors.
pros: Hinges designed to be easy to install and allow removal of seat for simpler cleaning
Composed of a molded wood core covered with durable and comfortable, cushioned vinyl
Several different colors and patterns available to match your bathroom decor
cons: Several purchasers found the vinyl cover to be less than durable, with tears and separation at seams occurring too soon after installation

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Not good this time! Cam with a small rip. Unfortunately had already thrown out box as soon as installed so can't return it. And now one screw is stripped after only a few weeks and cannot secure seat. It moves constantly. Very disappointed! Second time I have gotten same seat. First one was great but this one is terrible!
customer_reviews.author: shbeli

customer_reviews.title: Quality made
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality well made soft toilet seat. I especially like that it pops off easily for thorough cleaning. Better quality than I expected, has thick padded seat. 1 issue with it is the seat does not stay up by itself when lifted, this presents a problem for my husband when using it, but on the positive side, my toilet seat is never left up presenting cold surprises for me in the night, hubby is adjusting. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Soft Elongated Toilet Seat, lasts & comfy.
customer_reviews.text: These seats are the best! I have ordered 5 of these seats (lake cottage, vacation condo, & our home) and have reordered 1 after almost 3 yrs of everyone using it. Its not just for me. There is a hubby, and adult kids, grandkids, and company, and they last! These are great and comfy. No more cold seats so to speak. Nothing like a cold seat to wake you in the middle of the night, but not with these. Soft and Comfy! :) Thanks "Bemis" & Mayfair.
customer_reviews.author: vick

customer_reviews.title: Fine if no one stands on them
customer_reviews.text: Works great, I like the seat. However, if someone puts the lid down and stands on it (in the case of my 12-year-old, to get rid of cobwebs above the toilet) then the plastic arms that attach the lid will break and you are S.O.L. :-). We had 2 toilet seats break before I realized how this was happening. We don't have this problem with other toilet seats even when used as a stepping stool. The issue is that the plastic arms are fine for normal use, but when weight is put on the closed lid, the padding compresses and puts a lot of strain in the fragile plastic arms and they break.
customer_reviews.author: Innocent Bystander

customer_reviews.title: Updated review
customer_reviews.text: I contacted Bemis because this seat keeps coming unlocked. So, my invalid husband is at risk of falling due to a shifting toilet seat every time he uses it. Do you think they will make good on this? Heck no, they told me to put it in a clear plastic bag and take it back to the store. And what do we use while it's being replaced? Since I will need to buy a replacement seat, I'll just go for a full refund and get a different brand. Beware! They don't stand by their product.
customer_reviews.author: Trudyg

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE THE SNAP ON SNAP OFF INSTALL
customer_reviews.text: NO BENDING OVER THE TOILET AND REACHING BLINDLY UNDER THE BOWL LIP, TRYING TO GET THE PLASTIC NUT TO THREAD ON THE PLASTIC SCREW STRAIGHT SO IT WON'T LOCK UP AND GET STUCK CAUSE IT IS GOING ON WRONG ... ALL WHILE HOLDING THE TOILET SEAT ON NOW - FINALLY - THOSE DAYS ARE GONE FOREVER WITH THIS TOILET SEAT AND I AM THRILLED ABOUT THAT YOU ONLY HAVE TO SCREW ON THE HOLDERS ONCE THEN JUST REPLACE THE TOILET SEAT BY SNAPPING THE OLD SEAT OFF AND SNAP NEW ONE ON. I LIKE THE PADDED TOILET SEAT BUT EVERY 6 - 9 MONTHS WHEN THE VINYL CRACKS SO I LOVE THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca L. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Amazing seat But!
customer_reviews.text: This seat is so comfortable. But after using it for a month and half the material is ripping on the bottom seat corner.I’m so disappointed because I expected to last longer. I was out of warranty and with the pandemic is almost impossible to get on hold of an Amazon customer service rep so I called the manufacturer and they are sending me a new seat. Good luck with your purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lovetoshop1935

customer_reviews.title: Weak plastic hinges break too quickly
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this would be a decent padded seat except for a fatal flaw. The plastic hinges are cheaply made and break easily. I had the seat for about seven months under normal use for a 2 person household and the seat hinge broke rendering the seat useless Either they need to greatly upgrade the quality of the plastic or use metal hinges.
customer_reviews.author: Blind Dad

customer_reviews.title: Turns nasty color
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this seat when a family member broke their leg and sitting on a wood or plastic seat was uncomfortable. This seat is comfortable BUT it the foam turned nasty colors (orange/red) within a week of use! No cleaner could remove the discoloration. I don’t care how comfortable it is... it looks AWFUL and unclean, even though I know it’s just been cleaned. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Zach's mom

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it - Update
customer_reviews.text: But... we've only had it a month. It was easy to install and is very comfortable. My concern, based on previous reviews, is that a seam will split and render the seat useless. I expect to get at least a year's use from it before I declare it a good value. Update - it did not last a full year. The seat cracked after about six months; I weigh around 225 and my wife is 100 pounds lighter. Last week she noticed a tear in the vinyl on the other side, at the seam and perpendicular. The warranty has expired. We will be replacing the seat before it comes apart.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Clay

customer_reviews.title: problems in less than 5 months
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS FROM NOVEMBER 2018 I really love this seat. I'm 78 yrs old and like to have something cushiony to sit down on. It was very easy to install . The only thing is I'm just not sure how well it will hold up. The edges look a tiny bit worn but nothing major ...and believe me, once you've used one of these, you will never want to not have one again. I got a cheap one once and learned it's well worth it to pay a little more and get something better made. 3/2019 THE seat won't stay on. It has come off several times and I'll have to buy a new seat. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: PATRICIA W.

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed By Any Means
customer_reviews.text: This is so bad. It has the weirdest bolt set up we've ever seen. The left side keeps popping out and the entire seat moves about. The back has turned blue. I've read up on that. Hormone changes or meds can cause your clear sweat to react with the material of the seat. O joy! Rubbing alcohol is one way to remove stains but who can find it during this Covid-19 nonsense. I can clean a seat. What I can't do is have said seat flopping all around when I attempt to wipe me arse! It still hurts my bum.
customer_reviews.author: Tcsmith38

customer_reviews.title: Plastic fabric tore in less than 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Fabric (cheap plastic) tore in less than 2 months, tore around the edges of cover and seat. Where the seat connects to the toilet the hinges are plastic and work loose constantly. Also, it seems like it should be ultra comfy, but is not, your weight is unevenly distributed. I tossed it out and bought a hard plastic seat with a contour for a large male tush, that attaches with metal rods and screws and nuts (commercial grade). Much more comfortable and better fitting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy seat
customer_reviews.text: While I'm pleased with this seat, I do have a couple of observations. Both the lid and the seat covering will show impressions and stretch marks (from the flush apparatus for the lid and from sitting for the seat). These do disappear after a few moments once the lid is closed / the seat is unoccupied, but are unattractive until they clear up. Also, the seat sits slightly skewed to one side on the toilet and I'm not sure whether this is an issue with the seat or the toilet itself (which may have skewed mounting holes).
customer_reviews.author: Jim Edlin

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several of these over the years and have been satisfied with the product. However this time the quality has suffered. The cover for the padding is loose, the top lid when it is opened brings the seat up as well. The hinge for the seat slides even though the fasteners are as tight as they can be. I already threw the packing away because I never suspected the item would be so cheap and useless. Totally unlike the same product I’ve purchased in the past. What happened?
customer_reviews.author: Truth Seeker

customer_reviews.title: COMFORTABLE & ATTRACTIVE
customer_reviews.text: Simple to install with a fixed mount which allows you to remove the seat for cleaning. The main problem with cushioned toilet seats is that they frequently break down. The cushioned seat material often cracks and the mounting system breaks down. Although I haven't had this device for very long, so far it's been flawless and the mounting system is quite clever & should prevent or at least dramatically reduce the problem of breakdowns. This is the best cushioned toilet seat I've ever had and I've had to buy quite a few in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen C. Setzman

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable, and they last a long time
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable to sit on. Once you've installed the first one, installation of a new one is just a few twists of your wrist, with no climbing under or behind the toilet with wrenches. We have a decorative type of toilet that doesn't show the plumbing on the sides, but is nearly impossible to get at for seat replacement. This completely resolved that issue. They last well, usually several years, and are not very expensive, as these things go.
customer_reviews.author: FreeAtLast

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, flimsy hinge construction
customer_reviews.text: The good about these. Theyre comfortable, fairly priced, and the mounting is easy. Thats it however. The hinges that hold the lids on are so cheaply made plastic, that both of the ones i bought and installed had broken independently within 24 hours of installation. Just closing the lid normally on one caused on the the plastic struts to break, and on the other, both broke at the same time when lifting it up like any other toilet bowl lid. I've never seen such terribly made plastic hinges, and have never had this problem with any other toilet seats/lids. Just terrible construction on that part of the product which ruins what could be a perfectly decently toilet seat
customer_reviews.author: David Kiser

customer_reviews.title: Great seat - screws suck
customer_reviews.text: Easy disconnect. Like that. Nice soft seat. Like that. Made in the US. Like that. Screws started to rust after half a year. Thought it was dirt. Wiped the area clean. Then dirty always in the same area. Finally took a closer look and found the four screws holding the seat to the mounting hardware were totally rusted out. So a year later the screws are so far rusted, a screw driver can't pull them out. AND THAT TOTALLY SUCKS
customer_reviews.author: I. A.

customer_reviews.title: Does its job
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a great toilet seat. I've had it for a few months now and I have no complaints. This seat doesn't slide when screwed all the way in. I feel like it could one day though because it doesn't have as many feet as my old seat. However, it doesn't now. So, I can't fault them for that. The bracket to pop the seat on is a great addition. It makes cleaning very easy. And, most importantly, the seat is comfortable like you'd expect from a cushioned seat.
customer_reviews.author: Irish

customer_reviews.title: Came in chipped, toilet seat turns blue
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product for less than a year so far and have started to notice a bluish tone on the parts of the toilet seat I cover. I ordered this product in white, so this is starting to become very noticeable whther the seat is open or closed. The seat was also chipped on the side when it came in. The only good things I have to say about this product is that the seat is SUPER comfy and the hinges don't look like they're coming off anytime soon. Very disappointing that the seat is turning blue, though.
customer_reviews.author: IA

customer_reviews.title: MOST COMFORTABLE TOILET SEAT
customer_reviews.text: After searching for the best and most comfortable toilet seat on many websites and reading reviews, I kept coming back to this one. I'm 70 yrs. old and have a hard time sitting on those plastic low seats and can't boost myself to rise when I'm ready. So I ordered it and my husband installed it within a few minutes. We're both very happy and satisifed with this purchase and recommend this toilet seat as the best we've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: MAMA FELICE

customer_reviews.title: The anchor bolts keep coming loose😩😩😩
customer_reviews.text: This seat was the easiest one to install. The anchor bolts are mounted without the seat. Great idea. After the bolts are installed, the seat is placed on top and is attached to those bolts. There are two locking devices that are supposed to keep the seat attached to the bolt heads. Great idea. In my case, these devices won't stay locked. It appears, the slightest motion while sitting, will cause the locking devices to loosen. This allows the seat to become free floating - a dangerous situation.
customer_reviews.author: Babalooie

customer_reviews.title: RUST
customer_reviews.text: Why would anyone manufacture a product that is used so close to water, and that will be subject to disinfectant cleaners, and not use stainless steal screws to assemble it? Recommendation to anyone that has previously purchased this product.... go down to your hearest hardware store and purchase a package of at least 8 stainless steel screws (or you can order them on amazon) and replace all 8 screws on this toilet seat. Hopefully the manufacturer of this product will read this and make the change in their plant.
customer_reviews.author: Larry J.

customer_reviews.title: Good for elderly who feels pain from wood seats
customer_reviews.text: Really useful for an elderly relative who feels the pain of sitting on hard toilet seats. Only drawback is that she has Bowel issues that tend to stain the seat. However, this is vastly better quality than I can find in big box stores and is thus worth a repeat purchase. It's easy to install and remove for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Mergatroid Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Good information to know.
customer_reviews.text: Installation was very easy. However, it stains so easily. It’s discouraging. I have IBS and spend too much time on the thrown in one capacity or the other. I clean the underside of it daily and it’s still stained, only had it a month. I had also hoped it would be cushier than it is but I am not experienced with padded toilet seats so not sure how this compares.
customer_reviews.author: rocketgal4

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but won't buy again
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to install, easy to clean, looks good, it's very comfortable but after a month use the color starts to fade out, it turns light grey and after awhile a darker tone. This is my second one. On the first one I thought that what I was using to clean it was fading the color. So I bought another one, and just use damp rag to clean it. Still the white color started to fade again. So by conclusion is the seat. Won't get other one of this. Might try another brand or go back to a non-padded seat.
customer_reviews.author: joecritic

customer_reviews.title: All 3 have a blue discoloration on the actual seat
customer_reviews.text: This is an update to my previous review. At first it was comfortable and basically it still is but all 3 toilet seats started getting a faint blue cast to the white ring you sit on within the first month and now all 3 have a dark blue discoloration.
customer_reviews.author: Vivi

customer_reviews.title: Comforatable but irritating. Careful if you are a man it could "injure" your most precious area.
customer_reviews.text: The toilet seat is nice and coushiony. The problem is when you lift the seat will not stay up for a man to pee. Or if you want to clean the toilet bowl you would have to totally unhook the thing just to clean it. I clean my toilet bowl often, and that is just a lot of hassel to remove the thing continuously to clean it.
customer_reviews.author: Britt Banger

customer_reviews.title: Top quality and a cinch to install.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my mother to make her commode a little taller and a lot more comfortable. Her new seat was so nice, I ordered more. Didn't take more than two minutes to install, and the quick seat release makes cleaning so easy it makes me wonder why nobody came up with it ages ago. I'll never buy any other seats but these. Highest recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: BargainQuest

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: For those of you who refuse to sit on anything that doesn't comfort your bum, this is ideal. The price is the lowest I was able to find and the quality is on par with anything else that is out there. It is super easy to install and lasts for as long as you're able to keep it clean and functional.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony R

customer_reviews.title: worth buying more than once
customer_reviews.text: I'm a large size person, so soft toilet seats tend to have a short life span(The plastic pieces underneath get crushed and the vinyl seams separate quickly). This seat last me 3 years and I am glad that the same model was available for repurchase. I like that the seat snaps onto the screw mounts, rather than having to deal with the screws/tightening them on a regular basis like many toilet seats require.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Frost

customer_reviews.title: It Ed’s a little bit more height to your existing toilet so it makes it easier to get up and down
customer_reviews.text: I recently had a long hospital stay and when I finally got to rehab I could barely walk when I was discharged and came home I had to have someone physically pull me off the toilet because it was a little bit too low. I decided to order a cushioned padded seat which would make it a little bit higher and it worked I can now get on and off very easy
customer_reviews.author: Judith Lewkowitz

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but has a serious design flaw.
customer_reviews.text: I have nerve issues that make it necessary for me to sit on a padded seat -- it's great for that, and I would have given it 5 stars. However, the seat cover is ALSO cushioned, so the seat won't stay up! I have to put a large rubber band around it to get the seat to say up (I'm a guy). I can't imagine anything so stupid!
customer_reviews.author: mr.gokart

customer_reviews.title: Durable and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: We typically have to buy a new soft toilet seat every year and this is my first year buying this seat so we'll see how it holds up. It does seem to be a bit more durable than the other seats I've purchased so I think it might last longer as long as it doesn't turn blue like other soft toilet seats. It doesn't shift or move around and it is comfortable. Definitely would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Best one yet!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and doesn't slide! I was a bit concerned with previous mixed reviews especially related to tears in the vinyl. After reading many reviews it's my understanding that it is a trade off. If you want a cushioned toilet seat that's not cold, then you can expect to replace these periodically. To me it is worth it for the comfort. I do hope this one will last more than a year. I've had it for a couple of months now and I am very satisfied with it - no tears no problems ! I have purchased several cheaper versions of these and they we're not as comfortable and tore up within weeks. So far this one is excellent!
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Good solid seat
customer_reviews.text: This seat installs easily and solidly. Plastic posts mount to the toilet, then the seat clips on with a firm twist of the mounting hardware on the seat. Very stable once installed, does not slew sideways like some seats with lesser mounting systems. The only thing to watch now is longevity, as the padded seats I have had in the past seem to split rapidly. So far, very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: treshipp

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable priced, good, not great
customer_reviews.text: The Price is Right the problem the plastic is not as soft on the seat as the one I had before, it just feels a little cheaper, but only time will tell. it also doesn't have quite as much padding as the one I had on my round toilet, but oval padded seats are harder to find, so I'm grateful I could at least find one on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Arizonian ranch gal : ))

customer_reviews.title: Comfort For Short Legs
customer_reviews.text: I remember my grandmother having one of these when I was a kid and really liking it. The issue I have is that if I have to sit for more than 20 seconds on a hard toilet seat my legs can start to tingle. (circulation gets cut down) Not a problem with this one. Really like it. Too bad the lid doesn't have the soft close though because my husband told me it almost chopped him off! Oops! Guess he'll have sit or use one of the other toilets in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Hales

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and happy addition to the home
customer_reviews.text: Recently replaced the toilet in the master bath and for some reason the new one seemed twice as hard and ten times colder than the old one. So, this purchase was made to add some cush and comfort and it indeed did that. Very happy with it. Was easy to install and is easy to clean. Do not have the seat falling down problem some reviewers mentioned. It's a winner for us.
customer_reviews.author: SneakPeek

customer_reviews.title: Seat Covers Have Turned Blue
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these seats for a few of my bathrooms in Dec 2017 and have had no issues until now. My wife noticed recently that the top seat cover areas where the padding is has turned blue. I find it odd that both seats are blue after having them for almost a year. I would hope any cleaning product we have used over the year would not contribute to this issue. I believe the seat is possibly wearing down and loosing it white paint perhaps in under year. I will need to replace these seats so the rating is low since they did not last me even a year.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Cracked inspected before install
customer_reviews.text: Product must of been cracked at the lid attachment. Did not discover this until it was installed. I would never return a toilet seat! So I’m stuck with this until I can afford to purchase another. Very comfortable seating though.
customer_reviews.author: mommylve

customer_reviews.title: What To Do?
customer_reviews.text: Cushy comfortable. I bought two of these a year ago, both white and one is wearing off to blue and the other to red in different places. I do wipe off with cleaner wipes once a week and not happening all over. I am going to order replacements and see if the same thing happens again. See ya next year?
customer_reviews.author: Neilah Desiree

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable seat but had a couple small holes on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable seat but had a couple small holes on the side. Kind of feel a little helpless... It's more convenient than going to the store but in my opinion companies like this probably know that and sell defective equipment they got a cheaper price. It's like scratch and dent at a higher price and lower quality. They already know if you were planning on going out of your way to get something you can count on you wouldn't be shopping on here so we don't have to worry about them going out of their way to take it back. I think it's time for me to go back to brick and mortar
customer_reviews.author: Brian Keith Moon

customer_reviews.title: Soft on my butt :)
customer_reviews.text: I got this after noticing that my legs would fall asleep while sitting on the throne for long periods in the morning. This definitely helped with that. The one tiny downside is the cushion is quite large and after it is pushed down under my butt it feels like there is less room to get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Austin & Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great Installation.  Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so I know it's just a toilet seat, but there were some pleasant surprises. First and foremost was the installation method. After decades of having a screwdriver dedicated to (and exiled to) the bathroom for the express purpose of tightening the toilet seat screws that always seem to come loose with some regularity, I found myself literally amazed with the new seat. No more screws to tighten, this seat has been re-engineered so that once you attach the screws to the bowl, the seat has these two very handy snap on connections that attach to the top of the screws. Besides the NASA level toilet seat connection system, the seat is comfortable and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Wilem MacLeod

customer_reviews.title: Much Sturdier Screws than My Previous One
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased in the past a few Glazier Bay seats from a box store in my area. But saw this one on Amazon and read the positive reviews. The other one always was getting loose and moving off the base. At times I thought I might end up in my stall snower one day or on the floor. My sister helped me install it and she noticed the longer length and sturdiness of the plastic screws. So much firmer when installed than my old ones. So far so good. As far as the plastic seat ripping, it is too soon to tell as we just put it in last Saturday.
customer_reviews.author: Lee WolkeTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: A great toilet seat.
customer_reviews.text: First time ordering a toilet seat on line. This seat is awesome (as awesome as a toilet seat can be) its well made. Its better than the ones at Lowes/Home Depot which are expensive and tear easy. .The seat is easy to take off and clean. Im so glad I found this. you won't regret buying this.
customer_reviews.author: JOJO

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, sturdy, and quick shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Literally the easiest toilet seat to install. I had a harder time taking the old ones off. I am 300lbs and there is no wiggle and even though they can be removed with ease, they are sturdy as a rock. I replaced both seats in about four minutes. Solid quality and arrived the next day. Probably thr best product i have ever ordered from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby J Jones

customer_reviews.title: The seat turned BLUE! What a bummer!
customer_reviews.text: Nice seat, easy install, but after 4 months - it’s turning BLUE! Won't scrub off, it’s as if the white is discoloring or the cushion is causing it to turn blue! I wasn’t cleaning it was anything blue, what the heck? I’m not the only complaint, I noticed others have commented about the seat turning blue! ???
customer_reviews.author: Sandee

customer_reviews.title: My tush loves it
customer_reviews.text: Best padded toilet seat so far. I don’t seek out padded ts for comfort but for middle of the night use in a cold bathroom. I hate heat at night and shut it off till morning therefore the reg ts are freezing to sit upon. I always bought Glacier brand which is Home Depot’s for several years. They don’t last,cheaply made and rip. They are $5.00 less but a total waste of money.Update,needed to contact the company,they have the BEST customer service of most companies.
customer_reviews.author: avid reader

customer_reviews.title: Stains to easily
customer_reviews.text: It is so hard to clean I used bleach to clean poop stains off the toilet and couldn’t get it out. It looks awful but I need the padded seat for my mom so I kept it. Really wish I knew how to clean the stains off the seat. I used Clorox wipes on it right away and it wouldn’t clean.
customer_reviews.author: Randa

customer_reviews.title: Has Comfort But Not Durability
customer_reviews.text: It broke (the wood inside of padding) on the 30th day of use! I was so disappointed! I have chronic and debilitating sciatic pain, so the padded seat was needed, and it was helping me. However, I certainly expected it to be more durable. There are no tears, splits or punctures in the covering, so I am cautiously still using this seat; knowing that any day now, I will have to throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: A Real Soprano

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding!  Much better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good seat. I’ve read other reviews that say the seat doesn’t stay up but mine Does! It stays up by itself! The ingenious lock/seat removable system works great. This was so easy to install too. I love that I sit a few inches higher which prevents certain body parts from dipping into the water. Other seats I’ve tried don’t do that and I can sit comfortably knowing everything is okay. I Highly recommend this toilet seat.
customer_reviews.author: Keneagle

customer_reviews.title: So soft and durable!
customer_reviews.text: Would recommend to anyone! Absolutely love this toilet seat! Previously purchased our seats from Walmart, but they stopped carrying our shape in the padded versions. Would buy this over and over again! Soft and durable. Going on 2 months of use - Mom (120lbs), Dad (170lbs) and 10 year old (75lbs) ..let me also mention we share one bathroom, so this is constant use! Easy to clean, easy to install and did I mention how soft!?
customer_reviews.author: Desirae

customer_reviews.title: STAINS & Return nightmare
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why but cleaning this item is a nightmare. The vinyl they use is porous. You can try bleach, you can try 409, and nothing will clean it. For an item like this I would think they would just let you toss the thing but you may have to return it so keep your box. Lame.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Grogansgoat

customer_reviews.title: Soft seat is a must!
customer_reviews.text: I just received the item today. Hurry up told my boyfriend to attach it. The instruction was very easy to follow. The installation took less than 2 minutes. I was afraid it wouldnt fit my elongated toilet but it fits like a glove. So far I love it. The toilet seat is soft which brings a lot of comfort while sitting down. Definitely dont regret purchase it!
customer_reviews.author: Da

customer_reviews.title: Good cushioning
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my elderly grandmother because the regular toilet seat was too hard and uncomfortable for her. It didn’t provide any kind of “rise” to the toilet seat, just comfort. We paired this with handle bars since there was no additional height to help her and she likes this set up much better than before
customer_reviews.author: vcw

customer_reviews.title: Over engineered/lock system keeps failing
customer_reviews.text: The system designed to hold the seat in place is poorly engineered. Rather than the old tried and true method of nut and bolt someone thought it would be a good idea to use a lock in place system. It continues to fail and I have to fix it every few weeks. Unbelievable! I guess someone needed to justify their job. Don't buy it. A great product ruined because of poor design.
customer_reviews.author: paris

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit properly
customer_reviews.text: I like that it’s cushy and not cold like a regular toilet seat. Fortunately I didn’t throw my old seat away and reinstalled it because it just doesn’t fit. Would however make a great picture frame. To the dump it goes as I don’t think and hope these aren’t returnable.
customer_reviews.author: Pup-Pup'sMom

customer_reviews.title: Dry balls
customer_reviews.text: I bought this seat because I wanted a cushioned seat and one tall enough to keep my balls out of the water. This one fits the bill, however, lately it has begun to turn a lovely shade of pink where it comes in contact with the skin. I don't mind the two-toned look so I'll keep it and keep on smiling !!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit our American Standard elongated toilet and kept coming loose
customer_reviews.text: The seat did not fit our our elongated American Standard toilet. There was a gap in the back between the seat and the toilet rim. If that had been the only problem we would have put up with it, but the seat kept coming loose. It is described as easy to remove for cleaning, but it was poorly designed and came loose almost every time we used it. Unfortunately, we threw the packaging away or would have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: MomofTwins

customer_reviews.title: Elongated toilet seat is durable and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I've bought an elongated one of these, but I've used the regular size for years and it's been durable and comfortable. The only problem is that if you twist around the cap over the mounting screws may turn and pop up. You just have to be careful and check to make sure they're locked in place from time to time.
customer_reviews.author: A. Webb

customer_reviews.title: High quality padding!
customer_reviews.text: The padding is high-quality--much better than anything we have found in retail stores. It is like the hard foam beds that begin to mold to your form after just a few seconds. The negative is that the lid is heavy, and doesn't have a spring to let it down slowly as does the lid in our other bathroom. If I temporarily forget which bathroom I'm in and I close this lid, it falls quickly and slams loudly, and that makes me jump back and squeal, which makes my husband laugh.
customer_reviews.author: outlivemylife

customer_reviews.title: Its real comfortable and is easy to install
customer_reviews.text: The only issue I had was that the way the mounts are, it is likely to come loose easy but so fay so good . It may be better If some rubber washers were added under the bolt head. These tend to crack after a time and then become unsanitary. But until then they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: thought I ordered a round seat
customer_reviews.text: nice seat, thought I ordered a round one but no biggie. Fits OK and I'll live with it. Mounting system is too complicated for my tastes, simple screw and nut system has worked fine in the past but so far this locking type system is holding.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick L McClellan

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to install
customer_reviews.text: I probably needed to switch to a padded toilet seat for a while and I finally got around to doing it. I chose this one because it was labeled as easy to install. I had a really hard time and needed to call a handyman. I ended up paying him more than I did for the actual toilet seat.
customer_reviews.author: Darling Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, you'll like it!
customer_reviews.text: A few months ago we got a similar, but not equivalent foreign-made padded seat which was actually an inch short of covering the porcelain base. This Mayfair seat made right here in the USA was extremely well fabricated and was the right size for an elongated bowl. We recommend it highly. Great quality at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: John and Erika Keyes

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably price, extremely soft to a delicate backside
customer_reviews.text: I was having a flareup of my diverticulitis causing multiple trips to the bathroom. Causing all of my buttocks skin to be bruised in a short while. I ordered this and it made a huge Improvement in the bruising of my delicate butt fat
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality of vinyl is inferior
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to install, but the cap doesn't stay in locked position; but it's easy to re-lock However, I would not buy this brand again or recommend it because the vinyl stains easily and even when clean, doesn't look clean.
customer_reviews.author: snorkelbum

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: I've had this seat 2 months and it already slides all around. One side of the seat, where the bolt should be secured, is broken allowing the seat to move all around. You'll get pinched if you're not careful. My grown granddaughter, that lives with me, insists in a padded seat but the mire expensive Mayfair padded seat also has bad reviews. I don't think you can get a elongated cushioned seat that is made decently.
customer_reviews.author: Bsm

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my grandmother who is pretty skinny as the old seat was too hard for her bottom. She loves this one and I love that it removes easily for cleaning. Easy to install and anything that makes her happy makes me happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Josh b.

customer_reviews.title: Ingenious design
customer_reviews.text: cant comment on quality as just installed it but design is brilliant, both from an ease of installation and a marking standpoint. Where as normally, you install the screws and caps each time you install a new seat. With these, the screws go in first and then you attach the seat to them with a locking mechanism. Makes it much easier to clean the toilet and when you replace the seat, its an incentive to buy the same brand so you can leave the screws in and just replace the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Esqsimon

customer_reviews.title: Cushy for Your Buns
customer_reviews.text: When I received this seat and saw that the vendor had purchased it from Home Depot, I was a bit skeptical, as it was a store-bought Home Depot seat that I was replacing. What is special about this seat is the technology on the attachment bracket, as well as the quality of the seat itself. So far I'm happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall

customer_reviews.title: broke soon after installing
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6'1" and 230 lbs. Toilet seat broke (spare bathroom, so didn't use that often) after about a month. Felt like internal wood snapped. Didn't get hurt but very disappointed. Almost 70 and this is my first seat that broke.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy padded seat - perfect for sensory defensive child
customer_reviews.text: So, I can’t believe I’m reviewing a toilet seat... but, this is a great product. Super easy install - literally my 4 year old did one side and I did the other. This seat was the answer to our sensory defensive son’s toileting issue. The fear he was going to fall in coupled with the hardwood of our previous seat made each day a battle. But, I am thrilled that he loves this seat and feels comfortable on it!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Moore

customer_reviews.title: Too me 2 Minutes to Remove & Replace....LOVE this seat !
customer_reviews.text: So happy they kept the same mounting hardware because it too me less than 2 minutes to remove the old seat and install the new one, all while remaining standing too. YAY !! I am a customer for life!
customer_reviews.author: SuzziQ4U

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase! Going from sitting on a hard plastic seat to this makes me wonder why they dont automatically install these on all toilets. It was easy to install, easy to clean, and makes a huge difference. Not more numb legs!
customer_reviews.author: sj

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last.
customer_reviews.text: Yes toilet seat is easy to mount easy to clean easy to install but this is my second one that I have purchased from you guys and it last about 3 months and it starts to chair I'm a single woman who weighs 115 lbs I don't think there's a reason that they should continue to tear. I would not recommend anyone buying this date go to Target get one that lasts for at least a couple of years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Open The Package and Inspect Contents
customer_reviews.text: These are very good toilet seats, durable, comfortable and easy to install after the first install, because the hardware is there to clip the seat right in for replacement. My only issue was I didn't open the package immediately and when I did months later, one of the seats had a tear on top of it. It was too late to get a replacement. Haven't needed any yet but when I purchase them in a group I'll ensure to inspect them.
customer_reviews.author: K. C. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Waste money
customer_reviews.text: I got this product last month. It was easy to install but now it is removing sideways all mounting screw could not hold it and hard to clean. Now all white color wear out and scratched. I am not happy with this product wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Nani

customer_reviews.title: damaged toilet seat
customer_reviews.text: After installing the toilet seat I opened the seat cover and discovered the under side of the seat is damaged.another Please advise how to return this damaged seat for another one. Do I have to pay for the return shipment. Thank you waiting for your response. Harold Funakoshi Email address - funakoshiharold@yahoo.com 38 S. Judd St. Apt. 5A Honolulu, Hawaii 96817
customer_reviews.author: Harold Funakoshi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, comfortable and soft
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, comfortable and soft. Heavy and the plastic bolts are too big for my toilet and had to use old ones, the hinges are weak apparently. I bought in August and in November one of the hinges snapped broken. (I was sitting on it bathing my son, I carried him out the tub and turned to put him down) Because it's inexpensive, I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: star

customer_reviews.title: Poor hinge design will break within months
customer_reviews.text: Poor hinge design. The seat lid is kind of on the heavy side. I think it is wood. This combined with the quiet thin plastic hinges creates a recipe for hinge failure. Would you use plastic hinges on wooden doors or anything else heavy? It makes no sense. This toilet seat lasted about 3 months before breaking. It is not a matter of if but rather matter of when. What is otherwise a comfortable toilet seat is ruined by poor hinge design. Stay away from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher S

customer_reviews.title: Great seat. Good price. Great delivery.
customer_reviews.text: For the money this is a great seat. I have spent much more for a padded seat and they were not as good a quality as this seat. Real easy to install. Fast shipping. i
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Bob in Lakeland

customer_reviews.title: Best toilet seat
customer_reviews.text: Love the extra softness and I use it with a add on bidet sprayer that I love and it’s easy as all get up to install and switch out if the seat wears out. I’m 360lbs so that happens more than most.
customer_reviews.author: D.S.

customer_reviews.title: Yet another seat that doesnt stay up argh
customer_reviews.text: Well the pluses are it's very well made for the price. The mounting design is smart. And its soft to sit on. The one big minus is its yet another toilet seat that doesnt stay up when lifted. Designers need to design seats that stay up for guys !
customer_reviews.author: Bob G

customer_reviews.title: ... soft seats and previously found Mayfair to be the best. However
customer_reviews.text: We've tried several of these soft seats and previously found Mayfair to be the best. However, as with too many things in today's market, it seems they can not keep up the quality. Shortly after installing the seat we find the surface making folds. These folds are the type that will tend to crack open in short time. Needless to say, we are sadly disappointed in our last purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis K. Cook

customer_reviews.title: This seat is more heavy duty than most of the soft seats out there!
customer_reviews.text: I like that this seat is a lot more heavy duty than most soft seats on the market. However I am disappointed that I can't get anything but white or beige. I will be trying to spray paint it with a plastic spray paint so that it matches my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Ameliacatz

customer_reviews.title: Dont Buy! It's comfortable BUT it turned BLUE
customer_reviews.text: Noticed after a few days of use, the seat color started changing, seems like it's a recurring problem, noticed other reviews having the same issue. Its comfortable, but beware that the color might change with time.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: I'm buying a second one
customer_reviews.text: My bony husband wanted this for comfort. But an added bonus is the warmth! We keep our heat low at night, so the bathroom is quite chilly in the morning. No more cold toilet seat. I plan to buy this exact model for the guest bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Henderson

customer_reviews.title: I got this toilet seat and loved it. Then it turned colors
customer_reviews.text: I got this toilet seat and loved it. Then it turned colors. I contacted the seller on Amazon but they said they wouldn't do anything about it. They gave me the manufacturer's number. They were great and sent me another seat. However, this one also has turned to a darker color. While it is comfortable, if you want a white toilet seat, don't buy this one. Don't waste your money. Less than a year later and one replacement, and now it's splitting.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Soft seat for your throne
customer_reviews.text: This toilet seat has been in place for approximately a month now, it is as good as advertised, softer than a hard seat but not so soft that it's frail. I bought a toilet seat from Home Depot before this one that was cushioned, the vinyl had a crack in it within a month, it ended up being so cracked and everything coming out that I was hesitant to buy another padded seat. Well, the Mayfair has held up, hasn't cracked, is easy to clean and is comfortable, what else can you say about a toilet seat. I would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Tim Rohbock

customer_reviews.title: Soft but 1 issue
customer_reviews.text: Soft seat. But since the lid is also padded it doesn't stay up
customer_reviews.author: BKNJ17

customer_reviews.title: exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The only issue is I didn't pay close attention to the toilet size and its a little long for my toilet so I can see a bit of the toilet rim (but no gaps) in front but decided to leave it that way since it is way more comfy than the round ones.
customer_reviews.author: DeniseW

customer_reviews.title: Mmmm... maybe try something out next time.
customer_reviews.text: For a padded toilet seat it seems kind of hard and high. Installation is easy, but will it hold up.. that's iffy. I do have trouble keeping it in the upright position while going #1, it seems to wanna fall while in mid stream. LOL That gets annoying. Will probably try something else down the road, but the price is right I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Great price and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Price wise it is extremely competitive to what you can get at the home depot or any other store and I think it is very easy to install. Worth the money and wait. Seat cushion is very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wear out quickly!
customer_reviews.text: Love the padded seat. Problem is they wear out after max 5 months. I only weight 158 lbs. so don`t think I`m putting a whole lot of stress on it! Bought them for all 3 bathrooms and all of them are cracked! Too bad because they really are comfy. If you don`t mind shelling out the cash every few months there're great otherwise I would stay away.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Holding up so far, once i installed the seat.. I squeezed the stuff inside of it around the seat, before it was set on to loosen the material in it.. Seem to help and is holding up..
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: This is the softest toilet seat ever!
customer_reviews.text: My husband ordered this toilet seat for one of our bathrooms and I loved it so much, I ordered one for another bathroom and an extra to have. This is the best toilet seat I've ever invested in. Love it and you will too!
customer_reviews.author: S. L.

product_meta.title: MAYFAIR 113EC 000 Soft Toilet Seat Easily Removes, ELONGATED, Padded with Wood Core, White
product_meta.description:
Size:1 Pack Elongated| Color:WhiteThis Mayfair soft seat provides long-lasting durability and comfort. This soft seat features cushioned vinyl with a molded wood core and Easy-Clean & Change hinges that twist to remove the toilet seat for easy cleaning and replacement. NOTE: Colors on a website or printed from a website can vary drastically from the actual color of the toilet seat due to monitor and printer settings. The colors on this page are for approximate visual use and should not be used to match colors exactly to a toilet bowl.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Mayfair – For over 60 years, Mayfair has been bringing quality products with innovation and style to homes throughout North America. Mayfair toilet seats provide a wide variety of designs to easily integrate into any bathroom. The needs of customers are at the forefront of design with unmatched features and benefits that make everyday lives easier.

The Mayfair brand is part of Bemis Manufacturing Company, the world’s largest manufacturer of toilet seats. Founded in 1901, and in the fourth generation of family ownership, Bemis has grown from a maker of furniture and wooden wagons to an international enterprise with manufacturing and warehousing facilities worldwide. In addition to manufacturing toilet seats, Bemis is one of North America’s top non-automotive producers of contract plastic injection-molded components. With a continued commitment to the worldwide community, Bemis Manufacturing Company strives to set the standard for ecological responsibility, conservation and preservation.
feature_bullets: QUICKLY AND EASILY REMOVES: For cleaning or replacement
LONG LASTING COMFORT: Soft, cushioned Seat with wood core provides long lasting durability
PROUDLY MADE IN THE USA: With Earth friendly materials and processes
FITS ALL ELONGATED TOILETS: Including Kohler, American Standard, TOTO and many more

specifications.Warranty Description: Manufacturer warranty covers US and Canada customer purchases
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars2,204 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
